mapper.select:
select c.ch_seq , c.ch_name , c.ch_img , c.ch_active_yn , c.ch_memo , c.ch_st_dt , c.ch_end_dt , c.ch_open_yn , c.cret_id , to_char(c.cret_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_id , c.updt_id , to_char(c.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , case when to_char(c.ch_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') < to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') then 'Y' else 'N' end as finYn , COALESCE(p.fd_sum_amt, 0) as fd_sum_amt , case when to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric < 0 then 'D' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric else 'D+' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric end as d_day from web.channel c left join (select p.ch_seq, sum(pf.fd_amt) as fd_sum_amt from web.project p left join web.project_funding pf on pf.pj_seq = p.pj_seq group by p.ch_seq) p on c.ch_seq = p.ch_seq where 1=1
and c.ch_name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
order by c.cret_dt desc
and to_char(c.ch_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd')
and to_char(c.ch_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') < to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd')

select c.ch_seq , c.ch_name , c.ch_img , c.ch_active_yn , c.ch_memo , c.ch_st_dt , c.ch_end_dt , c.ch_open_yn , c.cret_id , to_char(c.cret_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_id , c.updt_id , to_char(c.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , case when to_char(c.ch_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') < to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') then 'Y' else 'N' end as finYn , COALESCE(p.fd_sum_amt, 0) as fd_sum_amt , case when to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric < 0 then 'D' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric else 'D+' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric end as d_day from web.channel c left join (select p.ch_seq, sum(pf.fd_amt) as fd_sum_amt from web.project p left join web.project_funding pf on pf.pj_seq = p.pj_seq group by p.ch_seq) p on c.ch_seq = p.ch_seq where (c.cret_id = #{memberId} or c.ch_seq in (select distinct ch_seq from web.project where cret_id = #{memberId}) )
and c.ch_name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
select case when ch_pass = #{pass} then 'Y' else 'N' end as passChk from web.channel where ch_seq = #{chSeq}::numeric

select c.ch_seq , c.ch_name , c.ch_img , c.ch_active_yn , c.ch_memo , to_char(c.ch_st_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ch_st_dt , to_char(c.ch_end_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ch_end_dt , c.ch_open_yn , c.cret_id , to_char(c.cret_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_id , c.updt_id , to_char(c.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , case when to_char(c.ch_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') < to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') then 'Y' else 'N' end as finYn , COALESCE(p.pj_cnt, 0) as pj_cnt , to_char(COALESCE(p.fd_sum_amt, 0), 'fm9,999,999,990') as fd_sum_amt_char , c.ch_pass , case when to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric < 0 then 'D' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric else 'D+' || to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric end as d_day , case when to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric < 0 then (100-trunc((to_char(now()-c.ch_end_dt, 'dd')::numeric/to_char(c.ch_end_dt-c.ch_st_dt, 'dd')::numeric)*-100, 0)) * 3.84 --화면프로그래스바의 100%값이 384임 else 384 end as d_day_percent from web.channel c left join (select p.ch_seq, count(distinct p.pj_seq) as pj_cnt, sum(pf.fd_amt) as fd_sum_amt from web.project p left join web.project_funding pf on pf.pj_seq = p.pj_seq group by p.ch_seq) p on c.ch_seq = p.ch_seq where c.ch_seq = #{chSeq}::numeric
